name: OR_CASE_IB_BODY
description: The OR_CASE_IB_BODY table contains OR management system case In Basket messages.

columns.name: OR_CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the In Basket message for the case.

columns.name: IB_HIST_BODY
columns.description: The body of the In Basket messages for the case.
